item.title: Shell Scripts to Manipulate The File Name Extensions
item.description: The latest version of this should be available on GitHub repo. Please report any issues there. The following snippets show how to change the file name extensions on multiple files on UNIX machines. Other commands like rename and mmv might offer alternatives when they are available on the systems. The scripts below use shell’s parameter expansion to operate on multiple files. % in below scripts match shortest from the end of the string.

item.title: HOLY CRAP!!!
item.description: HOLY MOTHER OF SWEET BABY CORN! It has seriously been a long while! 3 years? 4 years? Surprised the blog still exists! LOL! Actually not that much surprised. I pay every year to renew hosting so I know it exists! ðŸ˜› The TODO list thing I do. Seriously, it has gotten out of hand! I have unfinished drafts from 2011, 2012, 2013 which are still not posted! I feel embarrassed; at the same time I feel overwhelmed thinking how fast the time flies!
